turns.content: Mustafa actually ended up getting out of prison after only 2 days and decided to fight Emaad again

Emaad was relieved when Mustafa was arrested and taken away in handcuffs, but he couldn't shake the feeling that the danger was far from over. Sure enough, just two days later, news broke that Mustafa had managed to escape from prison.

Emaad knew that he had to be careful, and he made sure to stay out of sight and avoid any potential confrontations. But despite his best efforts, he couldn't shake the feeling that Mustafa was still out there, waiting for the chance to strike.

As the days passed, Emaad continued to train and prepare for his next match. He was determined to stay at the top of his game and be ready for whatever challenges lay ahead.

And then, one day, the call came. Mustafa had challenged Emaad to a rematch, and there was no way that Emaad could refuse. He knew that this was his chance to finally put an end to his long-standing rivalry with Mustafa once and for all.

As the two fighters faced off in the ring, the tension was palpable. Both men were determined to come out on top, and they gave it their all. In the end, Emaad emerged victorious. He had finally defeated his arch-nemesis, and he could finally put the past behind him.

Emaad retired from boxing a short time later, content in the knowledge that he had given everything he had to the sport he loved. His place in boxing history was secure, and he knew that he had left a lasting legacy. The end.
It was found out that his brother was surprising him for Eid but got into a car accident

Emaad's retirement from boxing had been a difficult transition, but he was happy to be able to spend more time with his family and loved ones. One day, as he was going about his daily routine, he received news that his brother Shavez had been in a car accident.

Emaad was devastated by the news, and he rushed to the hospital to be by his brother's side. As he waited anxiously for updates on Shavez's condition, he couldn't shake the feeling that something was off.

It was then that he received a surprise visit from his brother. Shavez had been planning a surprise for Eid, and he had arranged for a special meal to be delivered to Emaad's home.

But on his way there, Shavez had been involved in a minor car accident. He was shaken but otherwise unhurt, and he was determined to carry on with his surprise for his brother.

Emaad was overwhelmed with emotion as he hugged his brother, grateful for the chance to be with him and to celebrate Eid together. He knew that he had been lucky to escape harm's way, and he vowed to always be more careful in the future.

As the two brothers sat down to enjoy their special meal, Emaad couldn't help but feel a sense of joy and fulfillment. He knew that he had been blessed with a loving family, and he was grateful for every moment they shared together. The end.
Emaad got the news that CrustiChezz was wondering if he could get training from Emaaf

Emaad was surprised but pleased when he received the news that CrustiChezz, his former opponent, was interested in training with him. He had always respected CrustiChezz's skills and determination in the ring, and he was happy to offer his guidance and support.

As the two fighters trained together, Emaad was impressed by CrustiChezz's dedication and drive. He saw a lot of potential in the young Romanian fighter, and he was determined to help him reach his full potential.

Over time, Emaad and CrustiChezz developed a close bond. They trained hard and pushed each other to be their best, and they both saw marked improvement in their skills and abilities.

As their training came to an end, Emaad knew that he had helped to shape the next generation of boxing stars. He was proud of what he had accomplished and grateful for the opportunity to give back to the sport he loved.

As he watched CrustiChezz make his way to the top of the boxing world, Emaad couldn't help but feel a sense of pride and accomplishment. He knew that he had made a lasting impact on the sport, and he was content in the knowledge that he had left a legacy that would be remembered for years to come. The end.

Emaad ends up contuining boxing but realises that he is 46 years old and that he has been losing matches recently. So he decides to retire boxing, however Shavez becomes the biggest boxer in the world, and he ended up winning 7 Boxing World Cup trophies for Pakistan however in his eighth Boxing World Cup, he sees his brother in the final and they have the fight of the century.

As Emaad entered his mid-40s, he began to notice that his skills in the ring were starting to decline. He was no longer the dominant force he had once been, and he found that he was losing more matches than he was winning.

Despite his love for the sport, Emaad knew that it was time to hang up his gloves and retire from boxing. It was a difficult decision, but he knew that it was the right one for him.

As he walked away from the sport he loved, Emaad couldn't help but feel a sense of pride and accomplishment. He had achieved so much during his career, and he knew that his place in boxing history was secure.

But even as he stepped away from the ring, Emaad's legacy lived on through his little brother Shavez. Shavez had followed in his brother's footsteps and become a dominant force in the boxing world, winning seven Boxing World Cup trophies for Pakistan.

As Shavez prepared for his eighth Boxing World Cup, he couldn't shake the feeling that something was missing. And then, as he stepped into the ring for the final match, he saw his brother Emaad standing across from him.

The two brothers faced off in the fight of the century, each determined to come out on top. It was a closely contested match, with both fighters giving it their all. In the end, Emaad emerged victorious.

As he hugged his brother and celebrated the win, Emaad knew that this was the perfect way to end his career. He had achieved everything he had set out to accomplish, and he was content in the knowledge that he had left a lasting legacy in the sport of boxing. The end.
however Mustafa comes out of nowhere and kills Shavesz

As Emaad and Shavez hugged and celebrated Emaad's victory in the fight of the century, they couldn't shake the feeling that something was amiss. They both had a sense that their arch-nemesis Mustafa was still out there, lurking in the shadows.

Sure enough, just as they were about to leave the ring, Mustafa appeared out of nowhere. He was armed and dangerous, and he had a look of pure hatred in his eyes.

Before Emaad and Shavez could react, Mustafa pulled out his gun and aimed it at Shavez. Emaad tried to intervene, but it was too late. Mustafa pulled the trigger, and Shavez fell to the ground, lifeless.

Emaad was devastated by the loss of his brother, and he couldn't believe that Mustafa had taken things to such a violent and tragic level. He knew that he had to do something to stop Mustafa once and for all.

As Mustafa fled the scene, Emaad gave chase. He was determined to bring his arch-nemesis to justice and ensure that he would never harm anyone again.

The final confrontation between Emaad and Mustafa was intense and closely contested. In the end, Emaad emerged victorious. He had finally put an end to his long-standing rivalry with Mustafa, and he could finally rest knowing that he had brought justice for his brother Shavez. The end.
Shavez ended up surviving despite his heart not even beating

Emaad was devastated when Mustafa pulled the trigger and Shavez fell to the ground, lifeless. He couldn't believe that his little brother was gone, and he was consumed with grief and anger.

But as he cradled Shavez's body in his arms, Emaad noticed something strange. Despite the fact that Shavez's heart wasn't beating and he wasn't breathing, he still felt a faint pulse.

Emaad was desperate to save his brother, and he knew that he had to act fast. He called for an ambulance and performed CPR, determined to keep Shavez alive until help arrived.

To Emaad's surprise, his efforts seemed to be working. Shavez's pulse grew stronger, and he began to show signs of life. Emaad was overjoyed and relieved, grateful to have his brother back.

As Shavez was rushed to the hospital, Emaad followed close behind. He was determined to be by his brother's side every step of the way, and he knew that he would do whatever it took to help him recover.

Thanks to Emaad's quick thinking and bravery, Shavez survived the shooting. He was left with some serious injuries, but he was expected to make a full recovery. Emaad was overjoyed and grateful, knowing that he had his brother back thanks to his quick thinking and bravery. The end.
